languages.text: {n}Соломон поднимает глаза к потолку.{/n} "Клянусь Светом Императора, я не пытался оказать никаких знаков внимания. Я просто исполнял свой долг".
{n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон поднимает глаза к потолку.{/n} "Клянусь Светом Императора, я не пытался оказать никаких знаков внимания. Я просто исполнял свой долг".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's Light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."
{n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's Light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

{n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."
{n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lève les yeux au ciel.{/n} « Je jure sur la lumière de l'Empereur qu'il n'y avait dans mes actes aucune expression d'un quelconque intérêt personnel. J'ai fait mon devoir, purement et simplement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lève les yeux au ciel.{/n} « Je jure sur la lumière de l'Empereur qu'il n'y avait dans mes actes aucune expression d'un quelconque intérêt personnel. J'ai fait mon devoir, purement et simplement. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは天井を見上げた。{/n}「皇帝陛下の御光にかけて言いますが、個人的な関心を示そうとしたわけではありません。私はただ、任務を果たしていただけです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは天井を見上げた。{/n}「皇帝陛下の御光にかけて言いますが、個人的な関心を示そうとしたわけではありません。私はただ、任務を果たしていただけです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne levanta la mirada al techo.{/n} «Por la luz del Emperador, juro que no intentaba expresar ningún interés personal. Solo cumplía mi deber».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne levanta la mirada al techo.{/n} «Por la luz del Emperador, juro que no intentaba expresar ningún interés personal. Solo cumplía mi deber».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙抬起了头，看着天花板。{/n}“我以帝皇之名发誓，我这么做并不是想要引起你的个人兴趣。我仅仅是在履行我的职责而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙抬起了头，看着天花板。{/n}“我以帝皇之名发誓，我这么做并不是想要引起你的个人兴趣。我仅仅是在履行我的职责而已。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini tavana dikiyor.{/n} "İmparator'un ışığı üzerine yemin olsun ki sana özel bir şey değildi. Vazifemin gereğini yerine getirdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini tavana dikiyor.{/n} "İmparator'un ışığı üzerine yemin olsun ki kişisel bir şey değil. Görevimin gereğini yerine getirdim."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne blickt zur Decke.{/n} "Ich schwöre im Licht des Imperators, dass ich keinerlei persönliches Interesse zum Ausdruck bringen wollte. Ich habe einfach nur meine Pflicht getan."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to the ceiling.{/n} "I swear on the Emperor's light, I wasn't trying to express any kind of personal interest. I was simply doing my duty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne blickt zur Decke.{/n} "Ich schwöre im Licht des Imperators, dass ich keinerlei persönliches Interesse zum Ausdruck bringen wollte. Ich habe einfach nur meine Pflicht getan."
